roleset.name: to search and discover through persistent investigation
roleset.note: FERRET_OUT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ferret' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from ferret.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Back then , scientists-1 had no way of [*]-1 ferreting out specific genes , but under a microscope they could see the 23 pairs of chromosomes in the cells that [*T*-1]contain the genes .
